Disgorge.origin: [ordered a…salesman to about $468,000 he had earned by defrauding Iowa banks " National Law Journal "]

dis·gorg·ing.definition: to give up (as illegally gained profits) on request, under pressure, or by court order esp. to prevent unjust enrichment [ordered a…salesman to about $468,000 he had earned by defrauding Iowa banks ""]
